baseline_groups.claim_summary: MSR treatment (mixed seating with financial rewards) increases math scores by approximately 0.24 SD for lower-track students in Chinese elementary schools.
baseline_groups.notes: Table 3 Panel A main result. MSR on endline math for lower-track students, full controls, class-clustered SEs. Coef 0.24, SE 0.097, p=0.018. MS treatment is a separate arm with null effects, not part of this claim.

global_notes: Single main claim (MSR -> math scores for lower-track students). Non-core specs include MS treatment arm, average/Chinese score outcomes, Big Five personality, peer effects (different treatment var: deskmate_baseline_score), and upper-track results. Only specs varying controls/clustering/sample/funcform/method while keeping MSR on math_score_endline for lower-track students are core tests.
